did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Jimmy Carter, Letter to Seth B. Mellen 1971 4 May
did.abstract: This collection consists of one letter, from Jimmy Carter to Seth Mellen, concerning The Georgia Conservancy.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jimmy Carter, Letter to Seth B. Mellen, 1971 May 4, Accession #10598-a, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This letter was given to the Library by William Robert Mellen of Atlanta, Georgia, on September 18, 1987, and bears no restrictions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter, May 4, 1971, from Jimmy (James Earl, Jr.) Carter, Office of the Governor, Atlanta, Georgia, to Seth B[aldwin]Mellen, Mellen Parts Company, Atlanta, concerns The Georgia Conservancy. As a charter member of the organization, Carter expresses the importance of protecting and improving the environment, and solicits Mellen's contribution toward this goal.
